meaning_str.bing:
n. 钉；钉子；指甲；趾甲
v. 固定；揭露；抓获并证明有罪；抓住
网络. 美甲；钉住；爪

固定；揭露；抓获并证明有罪；抓住

指甲；趾甲；钉子；挂钩；<比喻>确凿证据；<俚语>逮捕；精确命中
（用钉子）钉牢；揭露；捕捉；逮捕；抓获并证明有罪；证明…不属实；击败；（在运动中）大力得分；（在棒球中）使跑垒者出局
（NAIL）国家人工智能实验室（National Artificial Intelligence Laboratory）

1.en: Not only is the product easy to use it's also easy on the natural nail as well, ensuring that no damage is done to the underlying nail bed.
1.cn: 这款产品不但容易使用，也易用于自然甲上，确保对基础甲床没有损伤。

2.en: Then he gave his son the hammer and told him to pull out the nail.
2.cn: 然后他将锤子拿给儿子，要儿子将钉子拔出来。

3.en: This is a powerful enemy who will not wait to see you on a ship before trying to lay into you tooth and nail.
3.cn: 这是个有力的敌人，他们不会等着你站在船上去攻击他们就已经早早的将你彻底粉碎了。

0.en: Unless you'd rather sit with the cheerleaders and discuss firm nail beds. My nail beds are history.
0.cn: 除非你宁愿和啦啦队一起讨论保养指甲有多重要。我早就不修指甲了。

1.en: Of course, you got to waddle past this guy to get to the nail salon.
1.cn: 当然了，你得绕开这个人才能去做指甲。

2.en: What's this? Blue nail polish? Yeah, I thought it was cute.
2.cn: 这是什么？蓝色指甲油？对，我觉得很好看。

3.en: Daddy Pig is going to knock the nail into the wall.
3.cn: 猪爸爸要把钉子钉进墙里面去。

4.en: Daddy Pig is going to knock the nail into the wall. Don't break the wall, Daddy.
4.cn: 猪爸爸要把钉子钉进墙里面去。别把墙弄坏了，爸爸。

5.en: My meeting with the NRA did not go well. They're going to fight this tooth and nail.
5.cn: 我跟全国步枪协会的见面并不顺利，他们打算全力以赴地阻挠此事。

6.en: Now I need a hammer and a nail. Stand back, children, and watch a craftsman at work.
6.cn: 我需要一把锤子，一颗钉子。往后站孩子们，好好欣赏工匠的本事。

7.en: Now I need a hammer and a nail. Stand back, children, and watch a craftsman at work.
7.cn: 我需要一把锤子，一颗钉子。往后站孩子们，好好欣赏工匠的本事。

8.en: Are you sure you can do it? Of course! I'll just put a nail in the wall and hang the picture on it.
8.cn: 你确定你能做到吗？当然可以！就在墙上钉颗钉子再把照片挂上去。

9.en: Are you sure you can do it? Of course. I'll just put a nail in the wall and hang the picture on it.
9.cn: 你确定你能做到吗？当然可以！就在墙上钉颗钉子再把照片挂上去。

10.en: First, I need a tape measure. And a pencil. That is where I'm going to put the nail. Don't break the wall, Daddy.
10.cn: 首先，我需要一把卷尺，和一支铅笔。不要把墙弄坏了，爸爸。

11.en: First, I need a tape measure. And a pencil. That is where I'm going to put the nail. Don't break the wall, Daddy.
11.cn: 首先，我需要一把卷尺，和一支铅笔。不要把墙弄坏了，爸爸。

12.en: I can still see the crack, Daddy. Yes, I'll just take the nail out and fill in the crack. Don't make a mess, Daddy.
12.cn: 我还是可以看见裂缝，爸爸。是啊，那我把钉子拿出来把裂缝填上。千万别把房子给弄乱了，爸爸。

13.en: I can still see the crack, Daddy. Yes, I'll just take the nail out and fill in the crack. Don't make a mess, Daddy.
13.cn: 我还是可以看见裂缝，爸爸。是啊，那我把钉子拿出来把裂缝填上。

14.en: Hey. Hey. Honey, that's a great idea nailing the boxes to the floor. I didn't nail the boxes to the floor. Oh, so you can move them.
14.cn: 亲爱的，把箱子钉在地上，真是聪明。我没把箱子钉在地上。所以你可以搬走咯。

15.en: Roman does not even know how to ice-skate. Can't you escort him out of the park on your way to the meeting? Maybe drop him at a nail salon?
15.cn: 罗曼，甚至连溜冰都不会，你去开会的时候，难道就不能把他带出公园吗？或许可以把他留在美甲店里？
